snippet.title: THE WALKING DEAD "A New Day" Story Trailer
snippet.description:
CGRtrailers, from Classic Game Room®, presents the Story Trailer for the first episode of THE WALKING DEAD entitled "A New Day". Get a taste of what to expect storywise when playing this first chapter in Telltale Games' take on Robert Kirkman's wildy popular comic book series. The Walking Dead is out now for Mac, PC and PlayStation Network (PSN). It will be out soon for the Xbox 360/Xbox Live Arcade (XBLA). Enjoy!

Check out more of the latest video game previews and trailers from Classic Game Room's CGRtrailers at http://www.youtube.com/CGRtrailers

Get more Classic Game Room on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/ClassicGameRoom
